fake_sensitive.description: Mark 50% of results as sensitive to test content safety.

additional_search_types.description: Toggle additional search types in the content switcher.

analytics.description: Record custom events and page views.

fetch_sensitive.description: Show results marked as sensitive in the results area.

force_dark_mode.description: Force the site to render in dark mode.

dark_mode_ui_toggle.description: Display the UI toggle to change the site color theme and respect system preferences.
